entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy. Wind light except northwest 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
